definition: holding office, to or toward the inside of, a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
details:
adjective
- holding office
- currently fashionable
= example: currently fashionable
- directed or bound inward
adverb
- to or toward the inside of
= synonyms: inward
noun
- a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
= synonyms: inch
